text: Sandra SPA Pogoń Szczecin is a men's handball club from Szczecin, Poland, that plays in the Superliga. ==European record== ===EHF Cup=== {| class="wikitable" ! Season ! Competition ! Round ! Club ! 1st leg ! 2nd leg ! title: Pogoń Szczecin (men's handball)
